items.sentence: What do you think Tom is doing at the moment?
I'm fairly certain I was supposed to do that.
I don't do that the same way my brother does.
I think that we both know the answer to that.
What makes you think that we need to do that?
I think that I could be persuaded to do that.
What makes you think that Tom has to do that?
I wanted to save this for a special occasion.
I have cut up all but one of my credit cards.
When I saw Tom crying, I started crying, too.
